full_text:
NEW ALBANY
THE NEW ALBANY COMPANY
FACSIMILE TRANSMITTAL SHEET
TO: Jeffrey Epstein
COMPANY:
FAX NUMBER: 212-750-0381
PHONE NUMBER:
RE: Comparison of Values Managed and Excluded Properties
FROM: Brent Bradbury
DATE: 9/30/2005
TOTAL NO. OF PAGES INCLUDING COVER: 4
SENDER'S REFERENCE NUMBER:
YOUR REFERENCE NUMBER:
URGENT  POR REVIEW  PLEASE COMMENT  PLEASE REPLY  PLEASE RECYCLE
NOTES/COMMENTS:
Jeffrey,
Attached is a schedule comparing the value of the Managed Properties as of 1/1/2002 and the estimated value as of 12/31/2004, including the calculation of the Performance Fee.
Regarding your request for the value of the Excluded Properties as of 1/1/2002, the E&Y appraisal done in 2001 only included "Managed Properties". Approximately 1,000 acres were not included in the E & Y appraisal because they were identified before the appraisal as Excluded Properties. In addition, a significant portion of the acres (approximately 1000) included in the appraisal were transferred to Excluded Properties before the Beginning Value was finalized. If you would like me to prepare an estimate the value of the Excluded Properties as of 1/1/2002 please let me know.
Regards,

NEW ALBANY
THE NEW ALBANY COMPANY

TO: Jeffrey Epstein

RE: Comparison of Values Managed and Excluded Properties

FROM: Brent Bradbury

TOTAL NO. OF PAGES INCLUDING COVER: 4
SENDER'S REFERENCE NUMBER:
YOUR REFERENCE NUMBER:
URGENT  POR REVIEW  PLEASE COMMENT  PLEASE REPLY  PLEASE RECYCLE

NOTES/COMMENTS:
Jeffrey,
Attached is a schedule comparing the value of the Managed Properties as of 1/1/2002 and the estimated value as of 12/31/2004, including the calculation of the Performance Fee.
Regarding your request for the value of the Excluded Properties as of 1/1/2002, the E&Y appraisal done in 2001 only included "Managed Properties". Approximately 1,000 acres were not included in the E & Y appraisal because they were identified before the appraisal as Excluded Properties. In addition, a significant portion of the acres (approximately 1000) included in the appraisal were transferred to Excluded Properties before the Beginning Value was finalized. If you would like me to prepare an estimate the value of the Excluded Properties as of 1/1/2002 please let me know.
Regards,

additional_notes: The document is a facsimile transmittal sheet with a cover letter discussing the comparison of values managed and excluded properties. The document is printed and contains no handwritten text or stamps. The document quality is good, with some minor speckling and a black border at the bottom.
